title: High Elf
content:
’t put them to sleep. Elven Weapon Training: Proficiency in Longsword, Shortsword Proficiency, Longbow and Shortbow.

High Elf Tips & Notes

During Early Access, the Elf race used to feature +2 Dexterity and +1 Intelligence. This has been changed in the full launch of BG3 and the Ability Score points are now associated with the Class that players will choose. Notes & tips go here.

Races and Subraces Asmodeus Tiefling ♦ Black Dragonborn ♦ Blue Dragonborn ♦ Brass Dragonborn ♦ Bronze Dragonborn ♦
